name: WALTERDOOM
description:
GAME

In the game WALTERDOOM You play as Walter White and shoot Jesses with Meth Shards because Jesse has multiplied and you found out that he played Project ISEKAI.

DEVELOPMENT

This version of the game is made in Construct 3, but soon i will be switching to a modded Doom client. The game is reeealy  early in the development so expect little content.
